alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bradley and Drew Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Green Hill, or 9 miles southwest of Monticello, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello... Wilmar... Green Hill... Ladelle... Prairie Grove... New Hope in Drew County... Collins... Valley... Enon... Sumpter... Lacey... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
